column4: ok I'm having a really weird problem - my computer keeps freezing up. I was on here a sec ago, and I had just asked a question about grub when it froze - could you tell me whether I disconnected at that point? (scroll up, it was about a minute ago)
no, the latest ubuntu, but I also have this problem on windows
ah ok. That means a hardware problem
you can test your memory with memtest86
ok. Also, how can I change the default grub boot entry?
I know, but I can't see which is the option
what does the umask thingy do?
it lets you read it as normal user....
ok this is strange, it still won't let me access it, and it won't let me umount it either, apparantely the device is busy. but fuser isn't showing up anything
